title: Rias - The Dream Seeker
body:
**Health:** 506 (+75 per level)
**Health Regen:** 5.69 (+0.5 per level)
**Mana:** 370.8 (+60 per level)
**Mana Regen:** 8.36 (+0.75 per level)
**Attack Damage:** 52.376 (+3.2 per level)
**Attack Range:** 475
**Attack Speed:** 0.647 (+1.68% per level)
**Armor:** 22.22 (+4 per level)
**Magic Resist:** 30 (+0 per level)
**Movement Speed:** 335

**Passive:** Aimless
Without any dreams to achieve pain or death does not bother her causing her to feel less pain then others and takes true damage as physical / magic damage depending on which one she takes more. (Excludes Ignite)

> Damage Reduction: 4 / 7 / 10%

**Q:** Separating Dreams
She shoots a missile that arcs out (like two Diana Q's shooting out) when it reaches at the end of it's range, is re-activated or hits an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the arc(s) are rooted.
[](http://[](https://astrologicos.files.wordpress.com/2011/09/aries_glyph.jpg))

>Range: 930
Damage: 65 / 100 / 135 / 170 / 205 + 65% AP
Root Duration: .85 / 1.10 / 1.35 / 1.60 / 1.85
Mana Cost: 54 / 58 / 62 / 66 / 70
Cooldown: 8

**W:** Lifeless Spark
Rias causes an explosion of wrath that envelopes herself, enemies in the initial burst take a large amount of damage and become stunned, for a few seconds the circle persists damaging nearby enemy who walks near and slows them. Enemies who take the initial damage take 75% reduced damage of the secondary damage.

> Initial Radius: 300
Secondary Radius: 200
Initial Damage: 75 / 125 / 175 / 225 / 275 + 75% AP
Secondary Damage: 45 / 90 / 135 / 180 / 225 + 55% AP
Max Damage:  86.25 / 147.5 / 178.75 / 270 / 331.25 + 88.75% AP
Stun Duration: 1
Slow: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35% until field is exited
Mana Cost: 75 / 80 / 85 / 90 / 95
Cooldown: 11 / 10.25 / 9.50 / 8.75 / 8

**E:** Shooting for the Stars
Rias sends out an arrow made of nothingness to a target. When the arrow reaches the target then she will teleport to it, in 3 seconds she can return to her former position.

> Range: 650
Damage: 40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 + 45% of AP
Mana Cost:  80
Cooldown: 14 / 13 / 12 / 11 / 10

**R:** Dream-Ender Staff (Literally 'ends' all their dreams by killing them.)
Rias slams her staff down at an enemy target dealing true damage based on missing health, enemies around the staff also take damage. If the target is killed, her mana is restored by 20% and the mana is refunded. In addition, all her non-ultimate abilities are refreshed.

> Range: 750
Radius: 575
Damage: 50 / 100 / 150 + 50% AP + 5 / 10 / 15% Missing Health (+1% per 150 AP)
Mana Cost: 150
Cooldown: 95 / 85 / 75

**Lore:**
I don't even know anymore, after Riot changed the lore system I'm not even sure how to write lores anymore.

replies.body: Wtf when you said rias I pictured rias from highschool dxd in my head lol
Holy fuck that r, its a super better version of garens ult, 1.Execute 2. TRUE DMG 3. MANA RESTORED AND/REFUNDED 4. CDR ULT  (loolool caps op)

It's actually pretty shit if you can't kill anyone. At the tank meta at the moment she's meant to counter the tanks by killing them and getting them off her team / adc. She either E / W / Q and E back hoping to kill the back line or just peel for the rest of the fight, that's just how important her ultimate is.
